question: Who founded the association ‘ Naujawan Bharat Sabha’ to help foster revolution against the British Raj by gathering together worker and peasant youth in 1928 ?
explanation: Naujawan Bharat Sabha was founded by Bhagat Singh in 1926. Members from the Hindu, Muslim and Sikh communities were there in the organization. The public meeting of the association was reduced after the killing of J.P. Saunders in 1928. In the year 1929, the association was banned.
